overview:
Steve is a seasoned executive that has held leadership roles within a major credit card processor, a global payment system, a global bank, and several innovative technology start-ups. He has solid and successful experience in bringing new innovative ecommerce products and services to global financial markets and he thrives in ambiguity and change oriented environments. Steve has a reputation as a rainmaker with a great rolodex in the financial services and internet security industries.

Steve’s expertise includes Strategic Innovation, New technologies, Business Development, Marketing, Sales, Product Management, Product Strategy, Channel Development, OEM’s and overall Global Expansion.

Addtionaly, Steve’s International experience in the following countries: Canada, England, France, Germany, Czech Republic, Taiwan, India, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, and Korea.

Steve has been quoted and featured in the following publications: CNET, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, USA Today, American Banker, InformationWeek, InternetWeek, Future Banker, Bank Technology News, The Industry Standard, and Computer World.

Steve is currently an Executive Vice President with Online Resources (NASDAQ:ORCC) and has also held executive positions with IronKey, GeoTrust, Arcot, Visa, First Data, and NationsBank. Additionaly, Steve has been an advisor to several innovative successful start-ups including dotBank, PayPal, and Splunk.
